text: The canton of Saint-Étienne-1 is an administrative division of the Loire department, in eastern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Saint- Étienne.Décret n° 2014-260 du 26 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département de la Loire It consists of the following communes: #Saint- Étienne (partly) ==References== Category:Cantons of Loire (department)
title: Canton of Saint-Étienne-1
